campos.py.data:
#coding: utf-8
#Cálculo de Campos de Futebol
# (C) 2017, Eduardo Pereira / UFCG, Programação 1
c1 = float(raw_input())
c2 = float(raw_input())
c3 = float(raw_input())
m1 = float(c1/4000)
m2 = float(c2/4000)
m3 = float(c3/4000)
media = (m1+m2+m3)/3
print '%.2f'% m1
print '%.2f'% m2
print '%.2f'% m3
print '%.2f'% media
